com.nttdocomo.ui
Interface KeyListener

All Superinterfaces:
EventListener
public interface KeyListener
extends EventListener

This defines the key input listener. Key listener designates the interface that shall be implemented by the object that obtains a key event in high level API.

See Also:
Panel

Method Summary
 void keyPressed(Panel panel, int key)
          This method is called when a key is pressed.
 void keyReleased(Panel panel, int key)
          This method is called when a key is released.
 

Method Detail

keyPressed

public void keyPressed(Panel panel,
                       int key)
This method is called when a key is pressed. The value of the key passed using an argument is defined for the Display class.

Parameters:
panel - The current panel when the key is pressed is passed.
key - The value of the pressed key is passed.

keyReleased

public void keyReleased(Panel panel,
                        int key)
This method is called when a key is released. The key value passed using an argument is defined by the Display class.

Parameters:
panel - The current panel when the key is released is transferred.
key - The value of the released key is transferred.
